languages.text: {n}Серый Вортен не сильно изменился с вашей последней встречи — все тот же здоровяк с туповатым выражением лица и налитыми кровью глазами. Однако в отличие от прочих слуг, архмилитант не выглядит изнуренным, как и сам Каллигос Винтерскейл. Эти двое полны ярости и желания сражаться, словно только что вышли на охоту.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Серый Вортен не сильно изменился с вашей последней встречи — все тот же здоровяк с туповатым выражением лица и налитыми кровью глазами. Однако в отличие от прочих слуг, архмилитант не выглядит изнуренным, как и сам Каллигос Винтерскейл. Эта двое полны ярости и желания сражаться, словно только что вышли на охоту.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten the Grey has not changed much since your last meeting — still the same brute of a man with bloodshot eyes and a dull expression on his face. However, unlike Calligos's other servants, the Arch-Militant does not look exhausted, and neither does Calligos. Both are filled with rage and thirst for battle, as if the hunt has only just begun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Серый Вортен не сильно изменился с вашей последней встречи — все тот же здоровяк с туповатым выражением лица и налитыми кровью глазами. Однако в отличие от прочих слуг, архмилитант не выглядит изнуренным, как и сам Каллигос Винтерскейл. Эти двое полны ярости и желания сражаться, словно только что вышли на охоту.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten the Grey did not change much since your last meeting — still the same brute of a man with bloodshot eyes and a blunt expression on his face. However, unlike the other servants, the Arch-Militant does not look exhausted, just like Winterscale. Both are filled with rage and thirst for battle, as if the hunt had only just begun.{/n}

{n}Worten the Grey did not change much since your last meeting — still the same brute of a man with bloodshot eyes and a blunt expression on his face. However, unlike the other servants, the Arch-Militant does not look exhausted, just like Winterscale. Both are filled with rage and thirst for battle, as if the hunt had only just begun.{/n}

However, unlike the other servants, the Arch-militant does not look exhausted, just like Calligos Winterscale. Both are filled with rage and thirst for battle as if the hunt had only just begun.{/n}

{n}Worten the Grey did not change much since your last meeting — still the same brute of a man with bloodshot eyes and a blunt expression on his face. However, unlike the other servants, the Arch-militant does not look exhausted, just like Calligos Winterscale. Both are filled with rage and thirst for battle as if the hunt had only just begun.{/n}

{n}Worten the Grey has not changed much since your last meeting — still the same brute of a man with bloodshot eyes and a dull expression on his face. However, unlike Calligos's other servants, the Arch-Militant does not look exhausted, and neither does Calligos. Both are filled with rage and thirst for battle, as if the hunt has only just begun.{/n}

{n}Worten the Grey has not changed much since your last meeting — still the same brute of a man with bloodshot eyes and a dull expression on his face. However, unlike Calligos's other servants, the Arch-Militant does not look exhausted, and neither does Calligos. Both are filled with rage and thirst for battle, as if the hunt has only just begun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten el Gris apenas ha cambiado desde vuestro último encuentro: sigue siendo un bruto de ojos inyectados en sangre y expresión cerril. Sin embargo, a diferencia de los otros sirvientes de Calligos, el Archimilitante no parece cansado, igual que el propio Calligos. Los dos están henchidos de rabia y sed de sangre, como si la cacería no hubiera hecho más que comenzar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey has not changed much since your last meeting — still the same brute of a man with bloodshot eyes and a dull expression on his face. However, unlike Calligos's other servants, the Arch-Militant does not look exhausted, and neither does Calligos. Both are filled with rage and thirst for battle, as if the hunt has only just begun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten el Gris apenas ha cambiado desde vuestro último encuentro: sigue siendo un bruto de ojos inyectados en sangre y expresión cerril. Sin embargo, a diferencia de los otros sirvientes, el archimilitante no parece cansado, igual que Calligos Winterscale. Los dos están henchidos de rabia y sed de sangre, como si la cacería no hubiera hecho más que comenzar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}自从你们上次见面以来，灰斑沃尔腾没有发生多大变化，他仍然是那个眼睛充血、一脸蠢相的野蛮人。然而，与其他仆人不同的是，首席战士看起来一点都不疲惫，卡里戈斯也同样如此。两人都充满了对战斗的愤怒与渴望，仿佛狩猎才刚刚开始。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey has not changed much since your last meeting — still the same brute of a man with bloodshot eyes and a dull expression on his face. However, unlike Calligos's other servants, the Arch-Militant does not look exhausted, and neither does Calligos. Both are filled with rage and thirst for battle, as if the hunt has only just begun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}自从你们上次见面以来，灰斑沃尔腾没有发生多大变化，他仍然是那个眼睛充血、面容生硬的野蛮人。然而，与其他仆人不同的是，首席战士看起来一点都不疲惫，和卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔一样。两人都充满了对战斗的愤怒与渴望，仿佛狩猎才刚刚开始。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten le Gris n'a guère changé depuis votre dernière rencontre : c'est toujours la même brute au visage maussade et aux yeux injectés de sang. Toutefois, contrairement aux autres serviteurs de Calligos, l'archimilitant, à l'image de son maître, n'a pas l'air épuisé. Tous deux ont toujours soif de sang et de combats, comme si la chasse venait de commencer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey has not changed much since your last meeting — still the same brute of a man with bloodshot eyes and a dull expression on his face. However, unlike Calligos's other servants, the Arch-Militant does not look exhausted, and neither does Calligos. Both are filled with rage and thirst for battle, as if the hunt has only just begun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten le Gris n'a guère changé depuis votre dernière rencontre : c'est toujours la même brute au visage maussade et aux yeux injectés de sang. Toutefois, contrairement aux autres serviteurs, l'archimilitant n'a pas l'air épuisé. À l'instar de Calligos Winterscale, il a toujours soif de sang, comme si la chasse venait de commencer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイの印象は、前回会ったときとほとんど変わらない…血走った目と、ぶっきらぼうな表情を野蛮な男だ。しかし、カリゴスの他のしもべたちとは違い、このアーク・ミリタントは疲弊しているようには見えない。カリゴスも同様だ。まるで狩りが始まったばかりであるかのように、両者とも怒りと戦いへの渇望に満ちている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey has not changed much since your last meeting — still the same brute of a man with bloodshot eyes and a dull expression on his face. However, unlike Calligos's other servants, the Arch-Militant does not look exhausted, and neither does Calligos. Both are filled with rage and thirst for battle, as if the hunt has only just begun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイの印象は、前回会ったときとほとんど変わらない…血走った目と、ぶっきらぼうな表情を野蛮な男だ。しかし、カリゴスの他のしもべたちとは違い、このアーク・ミリタントは疲弊しているようには見えない。カリゴスも同様だ。まるで狩りが始まったばかりであるかのように、両者とも怒りと戦いへの渇望に満ちている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Worten der Graue hat sich seit eurer letzten Begegnung nicht verändert. Er ist immer noch derselbe grobe Mann mit blutunterlaufenen Augen und ausdrucksloser Miene. Anders als Winterzunders andere Diener sieht der Erzmilitant aber nicht erschöpft aus, und auch Calligos tut das nicht. Beide sind voller Wut und Kampfeshunger, als habe die Jagd eben erst begonnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey has not changed much since your last meeting — still the same brute of a man with bloodshot eyes and a dull expression on his face. However, unlike Calligos's other servants, the Arch-Militant does not look exhausted, and neither does Calligos. Both are filled with rage and thirst for battle, as if the hunt has only just begun.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Worten der Graue hat sich seit eurer letzten Begegnung nicht verändert. Er ist immer noch derselbe grobe Mann mit blutunterlaufenen Augen und brutaler Miene. Anders als die anderen Diener sieht der Erzmilitant aber nicht erschöpft aus, genau wie Calligos Winterzunder. Beide sind voller Wut und Kampfeshunger, als habe die Jagd eben erst begonnen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gri Worten, son görüşmenizden bu yana pek değişmemiş. Kan çanağına dönmüş gözleri ve yüzündeki donuk ifadeyle hâlâ aynı acımasız adamı görüyorsun. Ancak Calligos'un diğer hizmetkârlarının aksine ne Başmilitan ne de Calligos bitkin görünüyor. Her ikisi de âdeta av yeni başlamışçasına çatışma için öfkeyle ve açlık hissiyle dolu görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Worten the Grey has not changed much since your last meeting — still the same brute of a man with bloodshot eyes and a dull expression on his face. However, unlike Calligos's other servants, the Arch-Militant does not look exhausted, and neither does Calligos. Both are filled with rage and thirst for battle, as if the hunt has only just begun.{/n}
